mapper.select: SELECT a.DWID,a.GRID,b.DWDM,b.DWMC,c.BZHM,c.xm grname,c.xb,a.ZHLB,a.ZCSBMC,a.ZRSBMC,d.dyrq,d.jbr, e.JBR lxhjbr,e.blrq lxhblrq,f.JBR xxbjbr,f.BLRQ xxbscrq,f.ZT,g.JCR,TO_CHAR(g.JCRQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') JCRQ, g.JC,g.CXJC,g.MEMO,g.jcid FROM GR_YLJF_ZYD a LEFT JOIN DW_XX b ON a.DWID = b.DWID LEFT JOIN GR_XX c ON a.GRID = c.GRID LEFT JOIN GR_JFPZ d ON a.GRID = d.GRID LEFT JOIN GR_JFPZ_LXH e on a.GRID = e.GRID LEFT JOIN GR_YLJF_ZYD f on a.GRID = f.GRID LEFT JOIN JC_JG g on a.GRID = g.GRID and a.DWID = g.DWID and g.MKDM='grkszc' WHERE d.JBR <> 'sys'
